assignment4

Class Arranger

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment4.Arranger

  • public class Arranger
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents an arranger that manages the section arrangement and updates the requests.

    • Method Detail

      • arrange

        public void arrange(Venue venue,
                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> groupToSec,
                    java.lang.String groupName,
                    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,GroupLeader> groupToLeader,
                    java.lang.String leaderName,
                    int numAttendee,
                    int numWheelchair)
             throws ReservationFailException
        Makes the seat arrangement given the requirements.
        Parameters:
        venue - the venue to be arranged
        groupToSec - the group-to-section map
        groupName - the group name
        groupToLeader - the group-to-leader map
        leaderName - the group leader name
        numAttendee - the number of regular attendee in the group
        numWheelchair - the number of wheelchair attendee in the group
        Throws:
        ReservationFailException - - when the reservation fails

      • checkVenueAvailable

                                   int numAttendee,
                                   int numWheelchair)
        Returns if the venue has enough seats for regular and wheelchair attendees.
        Parameters:
        venue - the venue to be arranged
        numAttendee - the number of regular attendee
        numWheelchair - the number of wheelchair attendee
        Returns:
        if the venue has enough seats

      • requestCancellation

        public void requestCancellation(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> groupToSec,
                                java.lang.String groupName,
                                Venue venue,
                                int numRegCancel,
                                int numWheelCancel)
        Make cancellation request for individuals.
        Parameters:
        groupToSec - the group-to-section mapping
        groupName - the group name to be canceled
        venue - the venue to be arranged
        numRegCancel - the number of regular attendees to be removed
        numWheelCancel - the number of wheelchair attendees to be removed
